ja229:1.2: sarābhivassebhi → sarābhivassabhi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); sarābhivassehi (pts-vp-pli1); sarābhivassibhi (?)
ja229:2.1: abhidhāvatha … gajjato”ti → abhidhāvathā ca patathā ca, vividhavinaditā ca dantibhi. vattatajja tumulo ghoso, yathā vijjutā jaladharassa gajjatoti. (si, pts1ed, mr) | Abhidhāvatha cūpadhāvatha ca → abhidhāvathā cuppatathā ca (sya1ed, sya2ed); abhidhāvathā ca patathā ca (pts-vp-pli1)
